item.title: Apache Hop 1.2 is available!!
item.description: The Apache Hop community is pleased to announce the general availability of Apache Hop 1.2.0. A huge thank you to everyone involved to made this possible. Hop Gui Hop Gui continues to evolve. The following list of improvements will make you even more productive in Hop. HOP-3298: Hop Gui now remembers the last environment you used when you switch to a project. HOP-3736: Hop Gui now remembers the logging level of the last run (used to default back to "Basic")
